report.title: Explore occurrences (standard filters)
report.description: A list of occurrences designed for tabular output.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id LEFT JOIN index_websites_website_agreements canEdit on canEdit.from_website_id=o.website_id and canEdit.to_website_id in (#website_ids#) and canEdit.provide_for_editing=true #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.sample_id=#sample_id# #idlist#

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include as columns in the report

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available. Can be used to generate the path in report_grid action links.

param.name: force_default_input_form
param.description: Force the defaault input form to be used instead of the one specified by the record

column.name: occurrence_id
column.template: {occurrence_id}

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when canEdit.id is null then null when o.input_form is null or o.website_id not in (#website_ids#) or #force_default_input_form#=1 then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end

column.name: pass
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.data_cleaner_result='t' THEN '
' WHEN true and o.verification_checks_enabled='f' THEN '
-
' WHEN o.verification_checks_enabled='t' AND o.data_cleaner_result IS NULL THEN '
...
' END

column.name: fails
column.sql:
case when o.data_cleaner_result='f' then replace(replace(replace(replace(onf.data_cleaner_info, '[', '
') end

column.name: status_hint
column.sql: case o.record_status when 'V' then 'Accepted' when 'R' then 'Not accepted' when 'T' then 'Test' when 'C' then case when record_substatus=3 then 'Plausible' when o.certainty='C' then 'Recorder considered this certain' when o.certainty='L' then 'Recorder considered this likely' when o.certainty='U' then 'Recorder considered this uncertain' else 'Not reviewed' end end || case o.record_substatus when 1 then ' as correct' when 2 then ' as considered correct' when 4 then ' as unable to verify' when 5 then ' as incorrect' else '' end || case o.query when 'A' then ', query raised and answered' when 'Q' then ', query raised' else '' end
